mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Music Festival
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Virginia Muisc Festival officials plan for June 13, 14, 15 concert series featuring National Symphon Orchestra of Washington, Hans Kndler conductor, at Scott Stadium. Dr. Meta Glass president of Festival associatin is seated with (l-r) Charls Barham Jr., executive vice-president, Linton R. Massey, vice-president, William T. Stevens, member of board of directors, and Walter R. Ryan Jr., Treasurer. Scanned by James Bland
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
